## Loader.findModInfos() method

Get all mod informations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findModInfos(path: string): Promise<ModInfo<T>[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | string | Mod jar. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;ModInfo&lt;T&gt;\[\]&gt;

An array of ModInfo<T>.
